headline.main: LONE ISLAND.; Mortally in Brecklyn--Decrease of the Cholera.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Health Officer reports 185 deaths for the week ending the 96th inst., being twelve less than the week previous. There were 30 deaths by Cholera, a less number by fifteen than occurred the week previous.
docs.snippet: The Health Officer reports 185 deaths for the week ending the 96th inst., being twelve less than the week previous. There were 30 deaths by Cholera, a less number by fifteen than occurred the week previous.

docs.lead_paragraph: COLD-BLOODED MURDER.--A day or two since, we noticed, in a short paragraph, that a man named EGBERT BARNETT was killed in Vermillion County, Illinois, a day or two before, by another named BOSLEY.
docs.snippet: COLD-BLOODED MURDER.--A day or two since, we noticed, in a short paragraph, that a man named EGBERT BARNETT was killed in Vermillion County, Illinois, a day or two before, by another named BOSLEY.

docs.lead_paragraph: Men of genius without endurance cannot succeed. Men who start in one kind of business may find it impossible to continue therein all their days. Ill health may demand a change. Now and wider fields of enterprise and success may be opened to them; new elements of character may be developed.

headline.main: Horrible Cruelty by an Unqualified Medical Practitioner.

docs.lead_paragraph: From the London Daily News. An inquest was beld by Mr. INGRAM, on Tuesday last, at the Blue Lion Inn, Manchester-road, on the body of MARY LAMBERT, of Bradford, Yorkshire, who, it was alleged, died on the 4th inst. of constitutional irritation, superinduced by the highly improper treatment of a scirrus tumor in the breast.

docs.lead_paragraph: NEWS FROM PLAINS.--By the arrival at this place of a gentleman via Rocky Eountains and the Plains, we get news of Messrs. BASEITT, KENNEY and STILES. The former, with suite, was met some distance above Laramie, in good health, pushing rapidly forward. rrs.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; THE CHOLERA. Fire. Emigrants for Europe. Prize Fight in the Fourteenth Ward. Cowardiy Attack on Hose Company No. 18. Extraordinary Occurrence. Important Arrival--Rain. EMBEZZLEMENT. COMMON PLEAS--CHAMBERS. ASSAULT WITH A BOTTLE. New-York Check Stolen. Emigration to Liberin. Revolt on Board the North Star. Alleged Robbery on the Isthmus.

docs.lead_paragraph: The gratifying fact is announced that the cases of Cholera have so far diminished in the City that it is deemed expedient to discontinue the daily reports. A proclamation to this effect, from the Commissioners of Health, appears in our columns this morning.

headline.main: SARATOGA.; Experiences of the Sick Man at Saratoga.

docs.lead_paragraph: I notice by to-day's paper that your fair and pleasant correspondent, Miss MYRTLE, has taken leave of Saratoga for the season. More's the pity. She told me as much at Congress Spring yesterday morning, but I had hoped she was romancing.
docs.snippet: I notice by to-day's paper that your fair and pleasant correspondent, Miss MYRTLE, has taken leave of Saratoga for the season. More's the pity. She told me as much at Congress Spring yesterday morning, but I had hoped she was romancing.
